title: Revert appears twice in the popup menu.
description: There are two instances of the Revert option in the menu.
OB: The Revert option appears twice in the popup menu.
EB: There is only one Revert option, and it is disabled as it should be. To reproduce the issue: 1) Open the editor. 2) Make changes to the file. 3) Save the changes. 4) Popup the menu.
SR: Fix the code to ensure only one instance of the Revert option is displayed in the popup menu.
